title: Heliborne Collection – v2.2.0
body:
Heliborne Collection – v2.2.0


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Vehicular combat, Third-person, 3D
Companies: JetCat Games, Klabater
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI16
Original Size: 11.8 GB
Repack Size: 3.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Heliborne.Collection-CODEX ISO release: codex-heliborne.collection.iso (12,619,939,840 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.8 to 3.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 8-22 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12.9 GB (up to 23.7 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Heliborne Collection offers two games through a launcher. Choose to play Heliborne or Heliborne Enhanced Edition.

Heliborne Enhanced Edition is a remaster of the original Heliborne. It offers an upgrade to the visual quality and a significant gameplay overhaul: prototype machines, night versions of maps, upgraded game engine, updated in-game physics and refreshed UI.

Fly some of the best helicopters in the world – from the classic machines of the 1950s to the modern gunships of the 21st century. Play missions with your friends and compete with players from all around the world in various multiplayer modes! You will be able to take part in a dynamic battlefield where you’ll support the movement of ground forces that fortify positions and create supply lines.

Game Features

  • NEW! Battle the AI in the new single-player mode!
  • lose yourself in a dynamic combat flying game
  • fly over 40 legendary helicopters, including models from 1955 to 2000’s
  • use over 100 possible payload variants
  • wide open maps, including The Gulf of Tonkin (Vietnam), Operation Nguyen Hue (Vietnam), Badakhshan Province (Afghanistan), Khost Region (Afghanistan), and Kosovo
  • test your skills in single player, co-op, and competitive multiplayer for up to 16 players
  • play your way: fully supports gamepads, flight sticks, and keyboard & mouse!

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous Heliborne repack.
